opis: Kuća se sastoji od prizemlja s dvije garaže i dvije konobe. Prvi kat: dvije sobe, dnevni boravak, blagovaona, kuhinja i kupaona. Potkrovlje: dvije sobe, dnevni boravak, blagovaona, kuhinja i kupaona. Okućnica iznosi 13000 m2. Uz kuću se nalazi bunar koji skuplja kišnicu. Kuća se nalazi oko 40 km od Senja i oko 70 km od NP Plitvička Jezera, te 1 km od ulaza na autoput ZG-ST. The house consists in a groundfloor with two garages and two cellars. First floor: two bedrooms, living room, dining area, kitchen and bathroom. Loft:  two bedrooms, living room, dining area, kitchen and bathroom. The land area is 13000 m2. There is also a well by the house, where rain water can be collected. The house is situated approx. 40 km from Senj, 70km from the National Park Plitvička Jezera (Plitvice Lakes) and 1km from the entrance on the highway Zagreb-Split. Das Haus besteht aus Erdgeschoss mit zwei Garagen und zwei Keller. Erste Etage: zwei Schlafzimmer, Wohnzimmer, Esszimmer, Küche und Badezimmer. Dachgeschoss: zwei Schlafzimmer, Wohnzimmer, Esszimmer, Küche und Badezimmer. Die Grundstücksfläche beträgt 13000 m2. Neben dem Haus steht ein Brunnen zur Wassergewinnung aus Regenwasser. Das Haus liegt cca 40 km von Senj und 70 km vom National Park Plitvička Jezera (Plitvizer-Seen), und 1 km von dem Eingang zur Autobahn Zagreb-Split.
